definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Hot water produces no incrustation, the causes of product touble is eradicated;
sentences.chinese: 热水设有水垢，产品故障隐患也就没有了。

sentences.english: The water here is so hard that all the pans fur up after a single use.
sentences.chinese: 这里的水质非常硬，所有的锅用了一次后就生水垢了。

sentences.english: It can also be good for your vaporizer: The vinegar will clear away any mineral deposits in the water tubes resulting from the use of hard water.
sentences.chinese: 醋可以消除因长期使用硬水而沉淀在水管里的水垢。

sentences.english: It is necessary to decrease the thickness of the incrustation in the cooling system in order to keep the engine operating normally.
sentences.chinese: 为保证发动机正常运转，必须减少冷却系水垢的厚度。

sentences.english: The wall of the pipes is becoming thinner and thinner as intergranular corrosion occurred under the incrustation.
sentences.chinese: 水垢下面的管内壁产生晶间腐蚀而减薄。

sentences.english: The cooling system should be cleaned at periodic intervals to prevent the accumulation of excessive rusts and scale.
sentences.chinese: 冷却系应定期进行清洗，以防锈蚀和水垢过量沉积。

sentences.english: Or add some vinegar, acetic acid to remove scale.
sentences.chinese: 也可以加醋，乙酸去除水垢。

sentences.english: Most hard water or lime scale removers are only acidic cleaners .
sentences.chinese: 大多数水碱或水垢清除剂只是酸性清除剂而已。

sentences.english: Before installing, flush pipe line to remove scale and debris.
sentences.chinese: 在安装之前，冲洗管道，清除水垢和碎片。
硬水导致的水垢是怎么回事？

sentences.english: So, according to the specific circumstances of the regular cleaning scale system plan.
sentences.chinese: 所以，根据具体情况应制定期清洗水垢的计划。

sentences.english: The well was side-tracked in order to avoid the scale producing formation.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免水垢污染产层，油公司决定对油井实施侧钻。

definition: tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)
tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)
